summary: "Billie Jean" is a famous song by Michael Jackson from his album *Thriller*. Released in 1983, it tells the story of a woman named Billie Jean who says Jackson is the father of her baby, which he denies. The song was a huge hit, reaching number one in many countries and becoming one of the best-selling singles ever. Its music video was the first by a Black artist to be played often on MTV. Jackson's performance of the song on TV also introduced his famous moonwalk dance. "Billie Jean" won many awards and is considered one of the greatest songs in music history.
title: Billie Jean
